item.description:
Note that the movie, the location, and the time have changed this week. We go a few buildings over to Cinestudio, also on the campus of Trinity, to see the rescheduled showing of Steven Soderbergh's Che.
Cinestudio has an admission fee of $8.

Film: Che. Part I, the Argentine (USA, 2008)
for information about the film and about Cinestudio, go to: http://www.cinestudio...

For directions to Trinity, please visit http://www.trincoll.e...
Or call (860) 297-2053.

For campus map, see:
http://www.trincoll.e...

If you can come earlier than 7:00, please join me for supper in the Cave cafeteria (basement of Mather Hall, no id required). Prices are reasonable and the food is decent. I'll get there by 6:00.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Film: Che. Part 1. The Argentine
